description:
*Rust Bristol 🦀* joins forces with *Rust & C++ Cardiff* for this first **hybrid event which** will be live streamed from our location in Bristol!

Program of that evening (order may change):

1. Welcome note & introduction to this event
2. Programming Veloren, an open source online game - *Joshua Barretto*
3. How I landed a Rust job - *Felix Gate*

**Live stream link: TBC.**
(online attendees will also be able to ask questions or comment)

**Physical Venue**:
Framework
35 King Street
Bristol, BS1 4DZ

Side note: this is the opportunity to create a Discord channel for the Rust Bristol community. Here's a link to join: https://discord.gg/rXwjM5BQdY
title: Birstol & Cardiff joined talks [Hybrid!] - Veloren (game) & Rust for a living
